ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen white grape-peach juice concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen white grape-raspberry juice concentrate
16 fresh mint leaves, or as desired
des: "This is a quick and easy punch. I have served it at both family functions and at work celebrations. In fact, this punch has been demanded for all co-workers birthday parties for over a year now."
ins: Mix ginger ale, white grape-peach juice, white grape-raspberry juice, raspberries, and mint leaves together in a punch bowl.
